title: Door
description: Describes if any door is open (if the door lock is released). Also see topic pe/doors_individually for status on individual doors.

traceId.description: A unique identifier to be able to trace this message. Also used to detect duplicate messages received.

doorOpen.description: True if any door is open (door lock is released). False if door lock is activated.

eventTimestamp.description: As specified in the [ADT documentation.](https://adt.transhub.io). Reflects the UTC time when the state changed.
